pages.text: The power point is an important resource for this mod, which is obtained by killing the $(l:overview/world_spawn#fairy)maid fairy$() or $(l:overview/world_spawn#rinnosuke)rinnosuke morichika$().$(br2)Can be used for $(l:overview/multiblocks_altar)altar$() crafting.
當你手持$(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)御幣$()時，在遊戲畫面的左上角就能看到 power 值。$(br2)Power 值最大為 5，超過此數值不再增長。

pages.title: Power Point
pages.text: Power point entity dropped on the ground.
